name: Maze Escape (AnshumanGameDesign)
description:
This is a submission for GMTK 2020 Game Jam. Theme for the Jam was: Out Of Control. Controls:- W/A/S/D - Move Around Mouse - Look Around

The Game design here is about the Maze, which constantly keeps changing over time and the Map for the Maze isn't available to the player.

Objective:- Players would have to find the Door Key and Use it to escape the Maze.

This is a game about a player being kept inside a maze, by the maze master and he needs to escape the maze to prove his skill and mastery over the maze created by his master.

Here both the Maze and the Map are Out Of Control for the Player.

Level 1 is Easier to Explore and Finish, while Level 2 really pushes player's ability in exploring and finding the key in the changing maze.

Although, beware of witches, creepy sounds and loot boxes.

Tip:- Try using Pen and Paper to figure out the Maze. Follow the Sounds, they will guide you in the dark night.

This is a non-commercial personal project and no payments/money is intended to make out of it.

Sound Effects:- Royalty free music from https://www.fesliyanstudios.com 

Background Music:- YouTube Audio Library
